trans-unit.source: Defines a point, associated with a user event, to be tracked in the potential execution path of a root workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: 定义与用户事件，在根工作流实例的可能执行路径中要跟踪关联的点。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 此类不能被继承。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] An activity designer or a workflow designer may use the overloaded <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.TrackData%2A?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext.TrackData%2A?displayProperty=fullName> methods to instrument the workflow to emit data to the runtime tracking infrastructure as a user event.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]活动设计器或工作流设计器可以使用重载<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.TrackData%2A?displayProperty=fullName>和<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext.TrackData%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法来检测工作流以将数据发出到运行时跟踪基础结构即用户事件。</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext.TrackData%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.TrackData%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The data emitted is referred to as user data.
trans-unit.target: 发出的数据称为用户数据。

trans-unit.source: Unlike activity status events, and workflow status events, which occur only on status changes, user events can occur at any location that is instrumented in a workflow.
trans-unit.target: 与活动状态事件和工作流状态事件，发生仅在状态更改，不同用户事件可以在工作流中检测到的任何位置发生。

trans-unit.source: There are many reasons to instrument a workflow to emit user events.
trans-unit.target: 有许多原因来检测工作流以发出用户事件。

trans-unit.source: For example, a workflow designer may want to communicate logical state information about the progress of a workflow, or an activity designer might want to provide an opportunity to activity members at times other than an activity status change.
trans-unit.target: 例如，工作流设计器可能需要传递的工作流进度的逻辑状态信息或活动设计器可能想要为活动成员有时而非活动状态更改提供机会。

trans-unit.source: A UserTrackPoint defines a point of interest in the potential execution path of a root workflow instance associated with a user event.
trans-unit.target: UserTrackPoint 定义与用户事件关联的根工作流实例的可能执行路径中的关注点。

trans-unit.source: A UserTrackPoint contains locations that are included in matching, locations that are excluded from matching, and any additional data that should be extracted from the workflow instance when the track point is matched.
trans-unit.target: UserTrackPoint 包含在匹配中包括的位置、 从匹配中排除的位置和跟踪点匹配时应从工作流实例提取任何额外数据。

trans-unit.source: You can add a UserTrackPoint to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile.UserTrackPoints%2A?displayProperty=fullName> to instruct the runtime tracking infrastructure to send a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingRecord> to the tracking service when the track point is matched.
trans-unit.target: 你可以添加到 UserTrackPoint<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile.UserTrackPoints%2A?displayProperty=fullName>以指示运行时跟踪基础结构发送<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingRecord>到跟踪服务跟踪点匹配时。</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingRecord> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile.UserTrackPoints%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The user data is returned in <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingRecord.UserData%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 在<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingRecord.UserData%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingRecord.UserData%2A?displayProperty=fullName>中返回的用户数据

trans-unit.source: A single UserTrackPoint may be matched at multiple points in the workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: 可以在工作流实例中的多个点匹配单一 UserTrackPoint。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> contains match conditions for a location associated with a user event in the potential execution path of a workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>包含与工作流实例的可能执行路径中的用户事件关联的位置的匹配条件。</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>

trans-unit.source: You can add <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> objects to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint.MatchingLocations%2A> to define locations that should be included in matching for the track point.
trans-unit.target: 你可以添加<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>对象添加到<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint.MatchingLocations%2A>以定义应包括在跟踪点匹配中的位置。</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint.MatchingLocations%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>

trans-unit.source: Similarly, you can add <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> objects to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint.ExcludedLocations%2A> to define locations that should be excluded from matching for the track point.
trans-unit.target: 同样，你可以添加<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>对象添加到<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint.ExcludedLocations%2A>以定义应从跟踪点匹配中排除的位置。</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint.ExcludedLocations%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>

trans-unit.source: You can add <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityDataTrackingExtract> objects and <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowDataTrackingExtract> objects to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint.Extracts%2A> to specify data that should be extracted from the workflow instance when the track point is matched.
trans-unit.target: 你可以添加<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityDataTrackingExtract>对象和<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowDataTrackingExtract>对象添加到<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint.Extracts%2A>以指定应在跟踪点匹配时提取工作流实例中的数据。</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint.Extracts%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowDataTrackingExtract> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityDataTrackingExtract>

trans-unit.source: The extracted data will be returned in <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingRecord.Body%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 提取的数据将在<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingRecord.Body%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingRecord.Body%2A?displayProperty=fullName>中返回

trans-unit.source: You can add to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint.Annotations%2A> to specify additional information associated with the track point.
trans-unit.target: 你可以将其添加到<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint.Annotations%2A>以指定与跟踪点关联的附加信息。</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint.Annotations%2A>

trans-unit.source: These annotations will be returned in <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint.Annotations%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 将在<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint.Annotations%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint.Annotations%2A?displayProperty=fullName>中返回这些批注

trans-unit.source: For an example of how to use this class, see the [Tracking Using User Track Points Sample](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d894a18a-a4c6-467e-9a42-8be025ecd4d5).
trans-unit.target: 有关如何使用此类的示例，请参阅[跟踪使用用户跟踪点示例](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d894a18a-a4c6-467e-9a42-8be025ecd4d5)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: The default constructor initializes an empty track point.
trans-unit.target: 默认构造函数初始化一个空的跟踪点。

trans-unit.source: No matching locations, excluded locations, data extracts or annotations are specified.
trans-unit.target: 指定任何匹配位置、 排除的位置、 数据提取或批注。

trans-unit.source: You must configure the track point by adding at least one <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint.MatchingLocations%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 你必须通过将添加至少一个<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>到<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint.MatchingLocations%2A>。</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint.MatchingLocations%2A></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>配置跟踪点

trans-unit.source: You may optionally add the appropriate objects to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint.ExcludedLocations%2A>, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint.Extracts%2A>, and <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint.Annotations%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 你可以选择将添加到相应的对象<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint.ExcludedLocations%2A>， <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint.Extracts%2A>，和<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint.Annotations%2A>。</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint.Annotations%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint.Extracts%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint.ExcludedLocations%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of annotations associated with the track point.
trans-unit.target: 获取与跟踪点关联的批注的集合。

trans-unit.source: You can add to Annotations to specify annotations to be returned in Annotations when the track point is matched.
trans-unit.target: 你可以将添加到要指定要跟踪点匹配时在批注中返回的批注的批注。

trans-unit.source: If Annotations is empty, no annotations are associated with the track point.
trans-unit.target: 批注是否为空，则不包含任何批注不都与跟踪点关联。

trans-unit.source: Annotations are `strings` that you define that contain information associated with the track point.
trans-unit.target: 批注是`strings`你定义包含与跟踪点关联的信息。

trans-unit.source: For example, an annotation could contain information about the possible execution path the workflow can take from this track point, or it could contain information to be displayed in a user interface.
trans-unit.target: 例如，批注可以包含工作流可从此跟踪点，获得有关的可能执行路径的信息，也可以包含在用户界面中显示的信息。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingAnnotationCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingAnnotationCollection"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty collection.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为空集合。

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of locations that should be excluded from the track point by the runtime tracking infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: 获取运行时跟踪基础结构应从跟踪点中排除的位置的集合。

trans-unit.source: If any of the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> objects in ExcludedLocations is matched for a particular user event, the track point will not be matched and no <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingRecord> will be sent to the tracking service.
trans-unit.target: 如果任一<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>ExcludedLocations 中的对象匹配特定用户的事件，将不会匹配跟踪点并且不<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingRecord>将发送到跟踪服务。</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingRecord> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>

trans-unit.source: If ExcludedLocations is empty, there are no excluded locations.
trans-unit.target: 如果 ExcludedLocations 为空，则没有排除的位置。

trans-unit.source: You can use ExcludedLocations to exclude specific locations from being tracked by the runtime tracking infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: ExcludedLocations 可用于从所跟踪的运行时跟踪基础结构中排除特定位置。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can exclude a subset of locations that are specified in <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint.MatchingLocations%2A> in order to more precisely refine the locations that should be tracked by the track point.
trans-unit.target: 例如，你可以排除的位置中指定的子集<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint.MatchingLocations%2A>以更精确地细化应按跟踪点跟踪的位置。</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint.MatchingLocations%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocationCollection"></xref> that specifies locations to be excluded from the track point.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocationCollection"> </xref> ，它指定要从跟踪点中排除的位置。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty collection.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为空集合。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection that specifies data to be extracted from the workflow instance and sent to the tracking service.
trans-unit.target: 获取指定要从工作流实例中提取并发送到跟踪服务的数据的集合。

trans-unit.source: When the track point is matched, the runtime tracking infrastructure sends a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingRecord> to the tracking service.
trans-unit.target: 匹配跟踪点后，运行时跟踪基础结构会发送<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingRecord>到跟踪服务。</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingRecord>

trans-unit.source: The user data is returned in <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingRecord.UserData%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 在<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingRecord.UserData%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingRecord.UserData%2A?displayProperty=fullName>中返回的用户数据

trans-unit.source: The runtime tracking infrastructure can also extract data specified in Extracts from the workflow instance and send this in the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingRecord>.
trans-unit.target: 运行时跟踪基础结构还可以提取中提取工作流实例中指定的数据并将此发送<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingRecord>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingRecord>

trans-unit.source: The extracted data is encapsulated in <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItem> records and returned in <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingRecord.Body%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 提取的数据将封装在<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItem>记录并在<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingRecord.Body%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingRecord.Body%2A?displayProperty=fullName>中返回</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItem>

trans-unit.source: You can add <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityDataTrackingExtract> objects to Extracts to specify member data that should be extracted from the activity associated with the user event and you can add <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowDataTrackingExtract> objects to Extracts to specify member data that should be extracted from the root activity of the workflow.
trans-unit.target: 你可以添加<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityDataTrackingExtract>提取以指定应从与用户事件和你关联的活动中提取的成员数据的对象可以添加<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowDataTrackingExtract>提取以指定应从工作流的根活动中提取的成员数据的对象。</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowDataTrackingExtract> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityDataTrackingExtract>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ExtractCollection"></xref> that specifies data to be extracted and sent to the tracking service.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ExtractCollection"> </xref> ，它指定要提取并发送到跟踪服务的数据。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty collection.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为空集合。

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of locations that should be included in matching for the track point by the runtime tracking infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: 获取应在跟踪点匹配中包括运行时跟踪基础结构的位置的集合。

trans-unit.source: If MatchingLocations is empty, the track point cannot be matched by the runtime tracking infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: 如果 MatchingLocations 为空，无法由运行时跟踪基础结构匹配跟踪点。

trans-unit.source: You must add at least one <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> to MatchingLocations for the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint> to participate in matching.
trans-unit.target: 你必须添加至少一个<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>到为 MatchingLocations<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint>参与匹配。</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>

trans-unit.source: The track point will be matched if any of the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> objects in MatchingLocations is matched and none of the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> objects in <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint.ExcludedLocations%2A> is matched.
trans-unit.target: 将匹配跟踪点，如果任一<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>MatchingLocations 中的对象进行匹配任何<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>中的对象<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint.ExcludedLocations%2A>匹配。</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint.ExcludedLocations%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocationCollection"></xref> that specifies the locations to be matched for the track point.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocationCollection"> </xref> ，它指定要为跟踪点匹配的位置。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty collection.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为空集合。
